title: Acupuncture & Herbs | Bakersfield, Ca | Cupping | Message | Chinese Herbal Medicine
author: Bruice Meier
cleaned_text: Welcome to Acupuncture & Herbs Acupuncture and Herbs is a state-of-the-art clinic located in Bakersfield, CA. Since 2007, Acupuncture and Herbs has integrated Eastern and Western medicine to be a leader in best practices and facilitate improved patient outcomes. Uniquely designed for each individual, our clinic offers Acupuncture, Massage, Cupping, and Chinese Herbal Medicine. At Acupuncture and Herbs, our goal is to help patients view themselves as a whole person in harmony with the world, while maintaining their health through natural remedies. Come relax, renew, and revitalize yourself at Acupuncture and Herbs. [Tyent Water Ionizer is for SALE with us. Ask us more about its Price and Benefits.](tyentwaterionizer.html) Opening Hours - Monday - Friday 8:30am - 5:30pm - Saturday Closed - Sunday Closed Need Help? Make an appointment to get help from
